attributes.action: Make Lord Mandelson Secretary of State for Morris Dancing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Morris dancing is in a perilous state. It urgently requires Lord Mandelson's political and hanky talents. Make him Secretary of State for Morris Dancing and olde England will be a better place.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
